httpErrorMsg.default: Unable to reach the server. Please check your internet connection or try after sometime.
httpErrorMsg.error404: Unable to reach Server Error code: 404
httpErrorMsg.error401: Due to browser inactivity for the past 1 Day your session has timed out and you must login again to access your data. We apologize for the inconvenience, but session timeouts were added for security reasons to ensure that your data is protected.

maintenanceText:
We are currently performing scheduled maintenance. We apologize for any inconvenience this might have caused.

Expected downtime: Until October 5, 2024 03:00 PM

Please check back later!

scheduleMaintenanceText.title: Scheduled Maintenance
scheduleMaintenanceText.message:
Our Website will be temporarily unavailable From 20/11/2024 11.00 PM - To 20/11/2024 03.00 AM.
We apologize for any inconvenience and appreciate your patience as we work to enhance our services.
Thank you for your understanding!
